definition: role (theater)/to compete/ancient three legged wine vessel/third note of pentatonic scale
angle/corner/horn/horn-shaped/unit of money equal to 0.1 yuan, or 10 cents (a dime)/CL:個|个[ge4]

pinyin: bu4 deng3 bian1 san1 jiao3 xing2
bu4 gui1 ze2 san1 jiao3 xing2
pa4 si1 ka3 san1 jiao3 xing2

sentences.english: One of the triangle's basic angles is 60 degrees.
sentences.chinese: 这个三角形其中的一个底角是60度。

sentences.english: The space of front lies among the last home room and the last home way, is a long triangle.
sentences.chinese: 前面的空间介于墓室和墓道之间，是个狭长的三角形。

sentences.english: The convention is that a strip's first triangle defines its winding.
sentences.chinese: 按惯例，由三角形带中的第一个三角形定义其环绕。

sentences.english: The convention is that a strip's first triangle defines its winding.
sentences.chinese: 按惯例，由三角形带中的第一个三角形定义其环绕。
在这里放一片小的三角形胶板。

sentences.english: A scheme of control polygon determination by the triangle convex hull is provided.
sentences.chinese: 给出了由三角形凸包确定控制多边形的方案。

sentences.english: Classical maximum area of inscribed triangle is extended in this paper.
sentences.chinese: 推广了经典的圆内接三角形面积最大值问题。

sentences.english: Young women were always interested in the trends of fashion, She was tricked to buy a scarf made of a triangular piece of blue silk.
sentences.chinese: 她被哄骗买了一条三角形的兰色丝绸围巾。

sentences.english: An ash cone rises from the center of the crater, casting a dark triangular shadow.
sentences.chinese: 火山口中间是火山灰锥，投下了三角形的暗影。

sentences.english: Then, you can look at the amount of area inside this triangular wedge.
sentences.chinese: 然后你可以看到在这三角形楔形物里的面积。

sentences.english: Put the two triangles together, you can get a rectangle.
sentences.chinese: 把这两个三角形拼到一起，可以得到一个长方形。

sentences.english: Ramp, triangle, noise, and DC waveforms.
sentences.chinese: 匝道，三角形，噪声和直流波形。

sentences.english: The shoes have elasticated gussets, making them easy to slip off and on.
sentences.chinese: 这种鞋嵌入三角形松紧布，穿脱方便。

sentences.english: The base line of this triangle is 20 centimeters long.
sentences.chinese: 这个三角形，底边的长度是20厘米。

sentences.english: They head broad and flat, like a triangle.
sentences.chinese: 它们的头又宽又扁，像一个三角形。
